alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will bring gusty winds and possible small hail to portions of Robeson, Dillon and northern Marion Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1157 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kemper, or 8 miles north of Mullins, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairmont, Lake View, Fork, Floydale, Kemper, Barnesville, Smithboro, Marietta, Proctorville and Orrum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Wilmington.
